channel.title: Godot3 on Peanuts Code
channel.description: Recent content in Godot3 on Peanuts Code

item.title: Advanced match 3 puzzle game in Godot
item.description: In this tutorial, we will create an advanced match-3 puzzle game, a type of puzzle game in which one piece is moved freely on the board for a certain period of time to erase three or more pieces of the same color in a row. これはモバイルゲームで人気を博した「パズル&ドラゴンズ（Puzzle & Dragons）/ 通称パズドラ」
